name: Integral Imp

dialogue.text: Integrals are the key to understanding area and volume...
Integration will lead to your destruction!

banter: Integration has been a challenge for many!
I will ensure you never forget the power of integration!!
I'll make sure you enjoy integration!
correct: I won't make the same mistake next time!
I was just going easy on you.
wrong: I could've done that with my eyes closed.
